update.description:
# What is added:

* Multistep forwards and backwards
* Rewind to the beginning
* Forward to the end
* Drag the time indicator to jump to a specific time (seek)

# Known back-end issues:

* Multistepping is not working properly for log files with skipped samples.

* Even for good files, stepping back one step doesn't work, and stepping back 10 steps steps only 9.

* Start any log file paused, then step one step: the time doesn't change but the model moves a lot - that's probably because the first chunk of the file doesn't have an iteration/time stamp.
update.title: Log playback GUI for multistep, rewind, forward and seek

content.raw:
Should we disable the `step_back` and `rewind` buttons when we're at the beginning of the log file and fast forward/step when we're at the end?

Besides this minor suggestion, it looks good to me.
content.html:
Should we disable the step_back and rewind buttons when we're at the beginning of the log file and fast forward/step when we're at the end?

Besides this minor suggestion, it looks good to me.
